ISSUE.TITLE: Event Logging docs incorrect
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The [Event Logging](http://www.flowable.org/docs/userguide/index.html#advanced.event.logging) section of the docs is outdated: - `ProcessEngineConfiguration` does not have a `setEnableDatabaseEventLogging` method - There is no `EventLogger` constructor that just takes a `Clock`. In addition, it's unclear how the event logger actually works â€” what does its output look like, and how do you query it?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add New Form Field Hyperlink (#393) * Update form-element-template.html Add Hyperlink field form * Update editor-directives.js Add Tab Advanced to Hyperlink form field * Update pt-BR.json Add translate to field URL Hyperlink * Update en.json Add translate to URL Hyperlink * Update es.json Add translate to URL Hyperlink * Rename pr-BR.json to pt-BR.json Change name of file of pr-BR.json to pt-BR.json * Update en.json Correction of the translation of the expression Maximum length and Minimum length
